caption_text:
WE’RE LESS THAN A WEEK AWAY FROM WONDERLAND✨ Where queer magic is the motivation and the groove is golden 🌈⭐️🪩🪄✨

Find your spot out on the floor and get lost in music with our shining lineup of DJs:

💫 DELICIOUS @deliciousdj_ 
💫 DIVAA @existentialcowgirl 
💫 SLAMBOXXX @i.am.slamoiselle 
💫 DANASONIC @danasonic_ 

And get ready to raise your fans and fives for our luxurious lineup of drag performers:

👑 @kween.karamelle  👑 @mr_dallas_ryder  👑 @annetiquedoll 👑 @exclusivelyzi 
+ gogo dancing energy from @thepkism 

Hosted by Mary Poppers @existentialcowgirl and @alexhannides in partnership with @kwgaysandtheys 

COME EXPERIENCE THE WONDER OF ONE BIG GAY DISCO, STUDIO 54 STYLE 🌈⭐️🪩🪄✨

ADVANCE TICKETS: $17 (includes Eventbrite fees) 
VENUE: @thehub_kw 125 King Street W, Kitchener (2nd floor venue with stairs; if assistance is needed, please let us know)

(A portion of ticket sales will be donated directly to @thrivehiv, a vital local resource that helps connect our community to life-changing resources and supports those living with HIV)

SEE YOU AT THE DISCO ✨
